title: Account now has my old accounts tickets on it and got suspended because of it
body: So my account was suspended since my old accounts tickets were transferred over for some reason and those old tickets contain things about my account getting hacked so since they were transferred to this account it got suspended for security reasons since it was "hacked" but really it was my other account so would love some help on getting the account unsuspended because i really want my great account back and this is that account btw and it was a permanent suspension so plz support help out i already made one support ticket about it

replies.body: I'm not really sure about the context, but we'd like to help.  The ticket you linked has been escalated to our account team who can help with recovery.  Make sure not to post reply with updates until you receive a response, otherwise you may return to the bottom of the queue.  Hang tight, and we'll reach out as soon as we can!

cool well ty but do you think they can help with unsuspending my account since nothing has happened with this one and I have done nothing wrong but basically what i am saying it was suspended for something that went down on another account of mine
